speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Dismay
               
              not
              ,
               
              princes
              ,
               
              at
               
              this
               
              accident
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Nor
               
              grieve
               
              that
               
              Roan
               
              is
               
              so
               
              recoverèd
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Care
               
              is
               
              no
               
              cure
              ,
               
              but
               
              rather
               
              corrosive

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
For
               
              things
               
              that
               
              are
               
              not
               
              to
               
              be
               
              remedied
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Let
               
              frantic
               
              Talbot
               
              triumph
               
              for
               
              a
               
              while
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              like
               
              a
               
              peacock
               
              sweep
               
              along
               
              his
               
              tail
              ;

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
We’ll
               
              pull
               
              his
               
              plumes
               
              and
               
              take
               
              away
               
              his
               
              train
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
If
               
              dauphin
               
              and
               
              the
               
              rest
               
              will
               
              be
               
              but
               
              ruled
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
We
               
              have
               
              been
               
              guided
               
              by
               
              thee
               
              hitherto
              ,

speaker: CHARLES
text:
And
               
              of
               
              thy
               
              cunning
               
              had
               
              no
               
              diffidence
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
One
               
              sudden
               
              foil
               
              shall
               
              never
               
              breed
               
              distrust
              .

speaker: BASTARD
text:
Search
               
              out
               
              thy
               
              wit
               
              for
               
              secret
               
              policies
              ,

speaker: BASTARD
text:
And
               
              we
               
              will
               
              make
               
              thee
               
              famous
               
              through
               
              the
               
              world
              .

speaker: ALANSON
text:
We’ll
               
              set
               
              thy
               
              statue
               
              in
               
              some
               
              holy
               
              place

speaker: ALANSON
text:
And
               
              have
               
              thee
               
              reverenced
               
              like
               
              a
               
              blessèd
               
              saint
              .

speaker: ALANSON
text:
Employ
               
              thee
               
              then
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              virgin
              ,
               
              for
               
              our
               
              good
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Then
               
              thus
               
              it
               
              must
               
              be
              ;
               
              this
               
              doth
               
              Joan
               
              devise
              :

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
By
               
              fair
               
              persuasions
               
              mixed
               
              with
               
              sugared
               
              words

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
We
               
              will
               
              entice
               
              the
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Burgundy

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
To
               
              leave
               
              the
               
              Talbot
               
              and
               
              to
               
              follow
               
              us
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              marry
              ,
               
              sweeting
              ,
               
              if
               
              we
               
              could
               
              do
               
              that
              ,

speaker: CHARLES
text:
France
               
              were
               
              no
               
              place
               
              for
               
              Henry’s
               
              warriors
              ,

speaker: CHARLES
text:
Nor
               
              should
               
              that
               
              nation
               
              boast
               
              it
               
              so
               
              with
               
              us
              ,

speaker: CHARLES
text:
But
               
              be
               
              extirpèd
               
              from
               
              our
               
              provinces
              .

speaker: ALANSON
text:
Forever
               
              should
               
              they
               
              be
               
              expulsed
               
              from
               
              France
              ,

speaker: ALANSON
text:
And
               
              not
               
              have
               
              title
               
              of
               
              an
               
              earldom
               
              here
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Your
               
              honors
               
              shall
               
              perceive
               
              how
               
              I
               
              will
               
              work

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
To
               
              bring
               
              this
               
              matter
               
              to
               
              the
               
              wishèd
               
              end
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Hark
              !
               
              By
               
              the
               
              sound
               
              of
               
              drum
               
              you
               
              may
               
              perceive

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Their
               
              powers
               
              are
               
              marching
               
              unto
               
              Paris-ward
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
There
               
              goes
               
              the
               
              Talbot
               
              with
               
              his
               
              colors
               
              spread
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              all
               
              the
               
              troops
               
              of
               
              English
               
              after
               
              him
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Now
               
              in
               
              the
               
              rearward
               
              comes
               
              the
               
              Duke
               
              and
               
              his
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Fortune
               
              in
               
              favor
               
              makes
               
              him
               
              lag
               
              behind
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Summon
               
              a
               
              parley
              ;
               
              we
               
              will
               
              talk
               
              with
               
              him
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
A
               
              parley
               
              with
               
              the
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Burgundy
              !

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Who
               
              craves
               
              a
               
              parley
               
              with
               
              the
               
              Burgundy
              ?

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
The
               
              princely
               
              Charles
               
              of
               
              France
              ,
               
              thy
               
              countryman
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
What
               
              say’st
               
              thou
              ,
               
              Charles
              ?
              —
              for
               
              I
               
              am
               
              marching
               
              hence
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
Speak
              ,
               
              Pucelle
              ,
               
              and
               
              enchant
               
              him
               
              with
               
              thy
               
              words
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Brave
               
              Burgundy
              ,
               
              undoubted
               
              hope
               
              of
               
              France
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Stay
              ;
               
              let
               
              thy
               
              humble
               
              handmaid
               
              speak
               
              to
               
              thee
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Speak
               
              on
              ,
               
              but
               
              be
               
              not
               
              over-tedious
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Look
               
              on
               
              thy
               
              country
              ,
               
              look
               
              on
               
              fertile
               
              France
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              see
               
              the
               
              cities
               
              and
               
              the
               
              towns
               
              defaced

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
By
               
              wasting
               
              ruin
               
              of
               
              the
               
              cruel
               
              foe
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
As
               
              looks
               
              the
               
              mother
               
              on
               
              her
               
              lowly
               
              babe

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
When
               
              death
               
              doth
               
              close
               
              his
               
              tender-dying
               
              eyes
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
See
              ,
               
              see
               
              the
               
              pining
               
              malady
               
              of
               
              France
              :

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Behold
               
              the
               
              wounds
              ,
               
              the
               
              most
               
              unnatural
               
              wounds
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Which
               
              thou
               
              thyself
               
              hast
               
              given
               
              her
               
              woeful
               
              breast
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
O
              ,
               
              turn
               
              thy
               
              edgèd
               
              sword
               
              another
               
              way
              ;

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Strike
               
              those
               
              that
               
              hurt
              ,
               
              and
               
              hurt
               
              not
               
              those
               
              that
               
              help
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
One
               
              drop
               
              of
               
              blood
               
              drawn
               
              from
               
              thy
               
              country’s
               
              bosom

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Should
               
              grieve
               
              thee
               
              more
               
              than
               
              streams
               
              of
               
              foreign
               
              gore
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Return
               
              thee
               
              therefore
               
              with
               
              a
               
              flood
               
              of
               
              tears
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              wash
               
              away
               
              thy
               
              country’s
               
              stainèd
               
              spots
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Either
               
              she
               
              hath
               
              bewitched
               
              me
               
              with
               
              her
               
              words
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Or
               
              nature
               
              makes
               
              me
               
              suddenly
               
              relent
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Besides
              ,
               
              all
               
              French
               
              and
               
              France
               
              exclaims
               
              on
               
              thee
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Doubting
               
              thy
               
              birth
               
              and
               
              lawful
               
              progeny
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Who
               
              join’st
               
              thou
               
              with
               
              but
               
              with
               
              a
               
              lordly
               
              nation

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
That
               
              will
               
              not
               
              trust
               
              thee
               
              but
               
              for
               
              profit’s
               
              sake
              ?

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
When
               
              Talbot
               
              hath
               
              set
               
              footing
               
              once
               
              in
               
              France

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              fashioned
               
              thee
               
              that
               
              instrument
               
              of
               
              ill
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Who
               
              then
               
              but
               
              English
               
              Henry
               
              will
               
              be
               
              lord
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              thou
               
              be
               
              thrust
               
              out
               
              like
               
              a
               
              fugitive
              ?

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Call
               
              we
               
              to
               
              mind
              ,
               
              and
               
              mark
               
              but
               
              this
               
              for
               
              proof
              :

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Was
               
              not
               
              the
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Orleance
               
              thy
               
              foe
              ?

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              was
               
              he
               
              not
               
              in
               
              England
               
              prisoner
              ?

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
But
               
              when
               
              they
               
              heard
               
              he
               
              was
               
              thine
               
              enemy
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
They
               
              set
               
              him
               
              free
              ,
               
              without
               
              his
               
              ransom
               
              paid
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
In
               
              spite
               
              of
               
              Burgundy
               
              and
               
              all
               
              his
               
              friends
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
See
               
              then
              ,
               
              thou
               
              fight’st
               
              against
               
              thy
               
              countrymen
              ,

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
And
               
              join’st
               
              with
               
              them
               
              will
               
              be
               
              thy
               
              slaughtermen
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Come
              ,
               
              come
              ,
               
              return
              ;
               
              return
              ,
               
              thou
               
              wandering
               
              lord
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Charles
               
              and
               
              the
               
              rest
               
              will
               
              take
               
              thee
               
              in
               
              their
               
              arms
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
I
               
              am
               
              vanquishèd
              .
               
              These
               
              haughty
               
              words
               
              of
               
              hers

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Have
               
              battered
               
              me
               
              like
               
              roaring
               
              cannon-shot
              ,

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
And
               
              made
               
              me
               
              almost
               
              yield
               
              upon
               
              my
               
              knees
              .
              —

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
Forgive
               
              me
              ,
               
              country
              ,
               
              and
               
              sweet
               
              countrymen
              ;

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
And
              ,
               
              lords
              ,
               
              accept
               
              this
               
              hearty
               
              kind
               
              embrace
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
My
               
              forces
               
              and
               
              my
               
              power
               
              of
               
              men
               
              are
               
              yours
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
So
              ,
               
              farewell
              ,
               
              Talbot
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              no
               
              longer
               
              trust
               
              thee
              .

speaker: PUCELLE
text:
Done
               
              like
               
              a
               
              Frenchman
              :
               
              turn
               
              and
               
              turn
               
              again
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
Welcome
              ,
               
              brave
               
              duke
              .
               
              Thy
               
              friendship
               
              makes
               
              us
               
              fresh
              .

speaker: BASTARD
text:
And
               
              doth
               
              beget
               
              new
               
              courage
               
              in
               
              our
               
              breasts
              .

speaker: ALANSON
text:
Pucelle
               
              hath
               
              bravely
               
              played
               
              her
               
              part
               
              in
               
              this

speaker: ALANSON
text:
And
               
              doth
               
              deserve
               
              a
               
              coronet
               
              of
               
              gold
              .

speaker: CHARLES
text:
Now
               
              let
               
              us
               
              on
              ,
               
              my
               
              lords
              ,
               
              and
               
              join
               
              our
               
              powers
              ,

speaker: CHARLES
text:
And
               
              seek
               
              how
               
              we
               
              may
               
              prejudice
               
              the
               
              foe
              .
